title: Create/Update VPS Configuration
description: Creates or updates a VPS configuration application structure with Nginx/Docker.

name.description: The short name for this configuration (e.g., hostinger, my-app). Used for directory and Nx project name.
name.x-prompt: Enter a short name for this configuration:

domains.description: Comma-separated list of domains/subdomains for Nginx & SSL (e.g., domain.com,www.domain.com,api.domain.com). The first domain is used for certificate paths.
domains.x-prompt: Enter the domain(s), separated by commas:

directory.description: The directory relative to apps/ where the configuration will be created.

forceOverwrite.description: Overwrite existing files if the project configuration already exists.

monitoring.description: Include monitoring stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki) in the configuration.
